title: Cyber crime
selftext:
At 11 today I got scammed on UPI , I didn't even entered pin or anything else but acc showed 3 debit transactions Totaling 40k one was a direct UPI transfer of 34k others were transaction on Myntra and olamoney. 
Is there any way to get that back , I complained in bank and cyber police also.

And one more thing is that now I am receiving bank messages and OTP from one private no and banks also, how is this possible, please help me with some solutions.
